trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract class for controls that allow multiple items to be selected.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una classe astratta per i controlli che consentono di selezionare più elementi.

trans-unit.source: When you derive a class from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector> class, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> property to `true` to allow multi-selection in your control.
trans-unit.target: Quando si deriva una classe dalla classe di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector> , impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> proprietà `true` per consentire la selezione multipla nel controllo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector> is an abstract class and cannot be instantiated directly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector> è una classe astratta e non è possibile creare direttamente un'istanza.

trans-unit.source: Starts a new selection transaction.
trans-unit.target: Inizia una nuova transazione di selezione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> metodo imposta <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> a `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A> metodo imposta <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> a `false`.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method in a class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> metodo in una classe derivata da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems" /> is <see langword="true" /> when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems" /> è <see langword="true" /> quando questo metodo viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the multiple items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> can be selected at a time.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se è possibile selezionare contemporaneamente più elementi in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if multiple items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> can be selected at a time; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se è possibile selezionare contemporaneamente più elementi in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" />. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> property to `true` in a derived class to allow multi-selection for that class.
trans-unit.target: Impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> proprietà `true` in una classe derivata per consentire la selezione multipla per tale classe.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set this property in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come impostare questa proprietà in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: Commits the selected items to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" />.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il commit degli elementi selezionati in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" />.

trans-unit.source: This method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `false` and updates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo imposta <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> a `false` e aggiorna il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> metodo imposta <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> a `true`.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method in a class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A> metodo in una classe derivata da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems" /> is <see langword="false" /> when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems" /> è <see langword="false" /> quando questo metodo viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> is currently performing a bulk update to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se è attualmente in corso un aggiornamento di massa di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> nell'insieme <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> is currently performing a bulk update to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems" /> collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />se è attualmente in corso un aggiornamento di massa di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> nell'insieme <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems" />. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> metodo imposta <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> a `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A> metodo imposta <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> a `false`.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> property in a class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> proprietà in una classe derivata da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>.

trans-unit.source: Selects all of the items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" />.
trans-unit.target: Seleziona tutti gli elementi in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" />.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method only if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questo metodo solo se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> è `true`.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems" /> is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems" /> è <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> that are selected.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene gli elementi selezionati in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" />.

trans-unit.source: The items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" /> that are selected.
trans-unit.target: Elementi selezionati in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" />.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `false`, you cannot add more than one item to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> è `false`, non è possibile aggiungere più di un elemento per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to do so will cause an exception.
trans-unit.target: Tenta di eseguire questa operazione genera un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: Unselects all of the items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" />.
trans-unit.target: Deseleziona tutti gli elementi in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector" />.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method regardless of whether <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questo metodo indipendentemente dal fatto che <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> è `true` o `false`.
